## updateMetadata() function

Updates the metadata for this object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function updateMetadata(ref: types.StorageReference, metadata: Partial<types.Metadata>): Promise<types.Metadata>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ref | types.StorageReference | StorageReference to update metadata for. |
|  metadata | Partial&lt;types.Metadata&gt; | The new metadata for the object. Only values that have been explicitly set will be changed. Explicitly setting a value to null will remove the metadata. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;types.Metadata&gt;

A promise that resolves with the new metadata for this object. See `firebaseStorage.Reference.prototype.getMetadata`
